root.name: Rosemary
root.description: Overview When Rosemary discovers a photograph of a forgotten friend, she cannot recall what has became of him, so she decides to travel back to the town of New Rye to find out if it brings back any memories. Gameplay At the start of the game the player has the choice to play one of three initial locations in any order. To progress in the game and solve the mystery, Rosemary's memory needs to be pieced back together. By examining the environment she will recall certain events that are stored as photographs. Placing these correctly in a diary completes lines of text, reveals additional information and changes the environment. The main action are shown through buttons at the bottom of the screen: look at, walk, talk, listen, smell, take, open/close, dig, hit and put. Hovering over locations in the environment with the mouse cursor reveals a tooltip with the name written in text, indicating that the player can interact with it.
